QuestData.Title: The Tipsy Tinkerer
QuestData.Description:
The massive kegerator that you built should be able to house all of the Rustbolt Resistance's beverages.
Find a spot to set it up in Rustbolt, and let the town know it's ready for use!
QuestData.LogDescription: Install the Rustbolt Kegerator in Rustbolt's bar, The Tipsy Tinkerer.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Install the Rustbolt Kegerator in Rustbolt's bar, The Tipsy Tinkerer.
